item.title: Kubernetes Create Images in Azure Container Registry
item.description: Creating a Container registry @ azure For this we’ll be using the azure container registry, alternatively you can use docker.io or google/aws based services. I will name my registry demoregistry this guide will get you started dependencies for azure registry: now we login via the azure cli pacaur -S azure-cli az login az acr login --name demoregistry after the az login it will show now let’s package up the node app
